title: Doubleclicking on import statement transfers to referenced type
description: When double-clicking on a type import statement in the package view outline, the editor opens on the target type instead of the unit hosting the import reference.
OB: In the package view outline, double-clicking on a type import statement opens the editor on the target type.
EB: In the package view outline, double-clicking on a type import statement opens the editor on the unit hosting the import reference.
SR: Ensure that double-clicking on a type import statement in the package view outline opens the editor on the unit hosting the import reference.
